characters.name: Reki Kyan
characters.description:
__Height: __176 cm (5'9")
__Talent: __Skateboarding; Woodworking

Reki is a second year of high school student who loves skateboarding. He gets caught up in the underground skateboarding race "S".
Reki has wild, red spiky hair and sports a trio-color bandana around his head. Moreover, he has amber-colored eyes and is of a light complexion. He is of average height and appears to have a lithe figure. He wears baggy dark-blue pants and sweater combo, with a yellow shirt underneath, similar to the skater-boy look.

(Source: Sk8 Wiki)

characters.name: Langa Hasegawa
characters.description:
__Height:__ 178 cm (5'10")
__Talent:__ Snowboarding, Skateboarding

At first glance, Langa appears to be a very stoic young man, barely showing any emotions. But on the inside, he’s more complex and appears to be more confident.

Langa is a teenage boy with blue hair that grows past his ears and blue eyes. He is above average height as he’s taller than [Reki](https://anilist.co/character/195120/Reki-Kyan). Throughout the series, Langa wears the average high school uniform of black pants, a yellow jacket, and a white button-down shirt. But when he associates with [Reki](https://anilist.co/character/195120/Reki-Kyan) he wears baggy clothes consisting of dark pants, a blue coat, and a gray-colored shirt.

Langa was born in Canada to a Japanese mother and Canadian father and grew up snowboarding. As a teenager, he and his mother moved to Okinawa to start anew.

(Source: Sk8 Wiki)

characters.name: Miya Chinen
characters.description:
__Height__: 158 cm (5'2")
__Talent__: Skateboarding, Talking to cats

Miya Chinen is a character in the SK8 the Infinity anime series who is an elite middle school student and candidate for Japan's national team. Miya is seen as a carefree boy. He is interested in skating, but not portrayed as obsessed like some of his competitors in "S," an underground and dangerous skateboard race at an abandoned mine.
As a child Miya loved skating and had fun with it. As he grew up, he began improving and received awards for it. However, this lead to his friends assuming that he saw them as "sidekicks" and looked down on them. Furthermore, this resulted in Miya losing his friends, eventually bringing about his negative outlook towards friendship as a whole.

characters.name: Hiromi Higa
characters.description: In his normal life, as a florist, Shadow looks friendly and kind to his customers. However, entering the middle of the night and S, he changes his attitude to be arrogant, bad, and rude which is thought to be his outlet whenever he experiences unpleasant things during the day.

characters.name: Kaoru Sakurayashiki
alt_names: Cherry Blossom (チェリーブロッサム)
characters.description:
__Height:__ 182cm

Kaoru is calm intellectual, well-known even outside of "S" as a famous and successful AI calligrapher. He's been shown to treat clients and strangers with polite respect, but is often prickly towards those closest to him, most prominently his fellow "S" member and childhood friend Kojiro Nanjo.
Kaoru is also notably competitive when skateboarding - but does truly trust and care for those who he considers his friends.

characters.name: Kojirou Nanjou
characters.description:
__Height__: 189cm
__Talent__: Cooking
__Affiliation:__ Sialaluce (restaurant)

He is a skilled skater and a founding member of "S", he uses his unique build and status to skate in an aggressive, movement-oriented manner. 

Despite his aura of hostility towards Cherry Blossom, they are good friends, who have the utmost confidence in each other and their abilities. He is shown to be deeply attached to Kaoru, being the person for whom Kaoru sneaks out of the hospital after his injury, and the one who carried Kaoru when he passed out after Adam's attack. Kojiro and Kaoru were shown to be close, using each other's first name in addition to the childhood friend aspect. Kojiro is extremely loyal to Kaoru and so is Kaoru.

Kojiro has a "papa bear" mentality and appears as a father figure to the young boys, giving them advice and noticing things that are wrong with them. He is very open-minded and kind to the young boys, trying to help them whenever he can.

He helps Reki overcome his doubts and often picks him up when he is afraid he might do something reckless. He talks to Reki when he is depressed, trying to help him regain his self-esteem. He notices the little things in the younger boy's behavior and his playboy personality fades as he shows support. He not only helps Reki, but also Langa to rekindle his friendship with Reki.

He often has a teasing aspect to his entity, but underneath his playboy exterior, he is a very loyal, watchful, and relaxed person who enjoys helping others.

characters.name: Ainosuke Shindou
characters.description:
__Zodiac:__ Taurus
__Affiliation:__ Diet Member
__Relatives:__ 3 Unnamed Aunts; Aiichirou Shindou (father)
__Talent:__ Skateboarding

He can use an ability called "Love Hug" which allows him to seem like he is riding uphill.

characters.name: Tadashi  Kikuchi
characters.description: He is Ainosuke Shindo's secretary and the person who originally taught him to skate.

characters.name: Shoukichi Oka
characters.description:
Oka is the manager at Dope Sketch, he  appears to genuinely care about the wellbeing of his employees, especially Reki.

He demonstrates that he isn't afraid to be dramatic and tell jokes, such as when he led Reki and Langa to believe that the reason he couldn't deliver a package was due to needing to work to pay off Dope Sketch's debt.

characters.name: Kiriko Kamata
characters.description: __Kiriko Kamata__ is an inspector working for the Police.

characters.name: Nanako Hasegawa
characters.description: Langa's mother. She grew up in Japan and moved in Canada with her husband Oliver. When he died, she and Langa moved back to Japan. She cares a lot for her son, as she has shown panicking about Langa's injuries.
